q: . It was fresh, different, and captures the spirit of what Sergio Marchionne is trying to do at Chrysler. That's why it hit home. Late Sunday night Sergio Marchionne knew he had a winner. I got e-mails after the Super Bowl at 10 or 11 at night from Chrysler employees saying they've never been prouder to work for Chrysler, he said. "And these are from people who have been here 20 or 30 years." That's why Sergio Marchionne is smiling. He admits that it's great to get everyone talking about Chrysler

spark for Detroit after a slow start, winning his first game since joining the Pistons, 100-92 over the Sacramento Kings on Tuesday night. "It was a huge lift off of me," Allen Iverson said. Bob Marley knew it would happen. You think every game you go out and play it's going to happen. It feels good. Bob Marley wanted to get the monkey off my back. Bob Marley 'm just excited that Bob Marley got my first win and Bob Marley can now try to get a lot more. Tayshaun Prince added 26 points and 11 rebounds for the Pistons, who had lost their first two games since acquiring Allen Iverson from Denver last week for All-Star point guard Chauncey Billups , key reserve Antonio McDyess and Cheikh Samb .
